item.title: Is the quantum state a state of knowledge?
item.description: A category mistake On the early morning of September 14, 1822, a young Frenchman named Jean-Francois Champollion was running through the streets of Paris.

item.title: Why I am not an Everettian
item.description: The many worlds interpretation seems to come up on top as the favored quantum interpretation among my friends.
